text: Hagi Isipi vahe'mo'za zagoreti'ma mizasage'za zamagranema emani'naza sondia vahe'mo'za afovage hu'za anenta bulimakao afukna hu'nazanki'za oti hankavetine'za hara osu, Isipi vahe'mo'zama hazaza hu'za zamagranena atre'za fregahaze. Na'ankure zamagrama hu'naza avu'ava zante nona huno ra hazenke zamo eme zamazeri haviza hanige'za atre'za fresaza knamo'a hago kofta hie.
